name: Johnson's Baby Lotion
description: Nourish and moisturize baby and adult skin for 24 hours with our classic Johnson’s®  Baby Lotion, Hypoallergenic Formula. Dermatologist Tested. Keep out of reach of children. For external use only.

name: Baby Magic Gentle Baby Lotion
description: Helps skin feel hydrated to help replenish skin's moisture barrier, Rich in anti-oxidants known to help hydrate and soothe dry skin. Free of sulfates, dyes, parabens, phthales

name: Boots Baby Lotion Gentle & Mild
description: Hypo-allergenic, Consultant Paediatrician approved. Helps skin feel hydrated to help replenish skin's moisture barrier, Rich in anti-oxidants known to help hydrate and soothe dry skin.

name: Private Labeling Welcomed Female Baby Lotion
description: Enhanced shelf life, High purity, Smooth. Helps skin feel hydrated to help replenish skin's moisture barrier, Rich in anti-oxidants known to help hydrate and soothe dry skin.

name: Comforts® Baby Lotion
description: To help protect baby's skin from dryness. It leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and non-greasy. It is mild enough for even delicate skin. Use it yourself to leave your skin feeling baby soft.

name: Organic Baby Lotion Ultra Care
description: Organic Baby Lotion Ultra Care / beauty fair lotion. It leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and non-greasy. It is mild enough for even delicate skin. Use it yourself to leave your skin feeling baby soft.

name: Fred & Flo Cuddly Soft Baby Lotion
description: Fred & Flo Cuddly Soft Baby Lotion leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and non-greasy. It is mild enough for even delicate skin. Use it yourself to leave your skin feeling baby soft.

name: Babi Mild Sweety Pink Baby Lotion
description: Cleanse and moisturize your baby`s skin, It contains ingredients from milk and soya milk, Smoothe the skin and sooth any kind of irritation on your baby`s skin, Make your baby`s skin soft and silky and healthier.

name: Mothercare Baby Lotion
description: Mothercare Baby Lotion non-greasy formula delivers 16 hours of continuous moisture. Leaving the skin feeling incredibly soft, smooth and nourished. Make your baby`s skin soft and silky and healthier.

name: Cosmo Baby Care Baby Lotion
description: Cosmo Baby Care Baby Lotion made with aloe vera, almond oil and vitamin E. Minarel oil and paraben free. Leaving the skin feeling incredibly smooth and nourished. Make your baby`s skin soft, silky.
